entry.em: ..HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT FRIDAY

entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS THIS EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A SLIGHT CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HUMID WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 20 PERCENT
HIGHEST HEAT INDEX READINGS HEAT INDEX READINGS UP TO 105 IN THE AFTERNOON

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY, HOT WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 70S
SOUTH WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
LOWS IN THE MID 70S

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 70S

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE MID 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING, THEN A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT
